alert.note: Alert for Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 3:25PM EST until January 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Ulster County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the afternoon and evening commute on Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will be near one inch per hour on Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
